participant_1.background:
I want to share my love of romance novels with others.
i like to drive for hours.
I play the guitar to accompany my singing.
I think about the beauty of nature and how lucky I am to experience it with my dog.
i do not like to clean house.

participant_2.background:
My recipe box is a collection of memories from my family.
I enjoy my own company and the challenge of archery.
My prized possession is my guitar, because it allows me to express my creativity and share my music with the world.
I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year.
i am learning to play the guitar.

content.text: Hey there. I am learning to play guitar.
How awesome! I am learning to play guitar too.
Really? What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play acoustic music. I like the way it sounds, and I can play it anywhere.
That's cool. I like to play blues and rock music. I like the energy and passion of it.
I love the energy of rock music too. I love to get up and dance when I hear it.
Me too! I love to dance and play guitar. It's so much fun to let loose and have a good time.
It's great to find someone who shares my love of music.
It is! I'm glad we met. Maybe we can jam together sometime.
That would be awesome! Let's exchange numbers and we can figure out a time.
